# NSURLRequest.Attribution.user

**Case**

The user explicitly directs the app to make a network request.

## Declaration

```swift
case user
```

## Discussion

Use this value for the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URLRequest/attribution-swift.property] parameter of a URL request that satisfies a user request to access an explicit, unmodified URL. In all other cases, use the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSURLRequest/Attribution-swift.enum/developer] value instead.

## Request sources

- **NSURLRequest.Attribution.developer**: A developer-initiated network request.
title: NSURLRequest.Attribution.user
